markdownRemark.html: 🐏🎵 Corporate Relations Chair ● Publicity & Promotions Chair ● Wrote inaugural Corporate Sponsorship Proposal Packet. Educated the VCU and Richmond community about Dance Marathon, a fundraiser for the Children’s Miracle Network Hospital of Richmond, by managing website and social media.
